metadata.title: CVE-2014-0124 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The identity-reporting implementations in mod/forum/renderer.php andmod/quiz/override_form.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.9,2.5.x before 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 do not properly restrict thedisplay of e-mail addresses, which allows remote authenticated users toobtain sensitive information by using the (1) Forum or (2) Quiz module.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
